00024 // constant.cpp*
00025 #include "pbrt.h"
00026 #include "texture.h"
00027 #include "paramset.h"
00028 // ConstantTexture Method Definitions
00029 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<float> * CreateFloatTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00030                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00031         return new ConstantTexture<float>(tp.FindFloat("value", 1.f));
00032 }
00033 
00034 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<Spectrum> * CreateSpectrumTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00035                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00036         return new ConstantTexture<Spectrum>(tp.FindSpectrum("value", Spectrum(1.f)));
00037 }
